Falters at times: The claim falters at times as there is disagreement over whether rent control helps "struggling renters" and whether it would have an effect on homeowners.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to back up the statement that Proposition 10 would have "no effect on homeowners."
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that rent control would automatically be imposed on single-family home rentals if Proposition 10 were to pass, which is disputed by supporters of the measure.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by opponents of Proposition 10, who argue that the claim of "no effect on homeowners" is false and disregards the truth.
